definitions: a characteristic that enables things, people, or classes to be distinguished from one another

examples.text: age should not be used as a primary discriminator in recruitment

shortDefinitions: characteristic which enables people or things to be distinguished from one another

definitions: a circuit or device which only produces an output when the input exceeds a fixed value.
shortDefinitions: circuit or device which only produces output when input exceeds fixed value

definitions: a circuit which converts a frequency-modulated signal into an amplitude-modulated one.
shortDefinitions: circuit which converts frequency-modulated signal into amplitude-modulated one
